title: EC2 instances have insufficient disk space

content.raw:
You must create a block device mapping first:

http://stackoverflow.com/questions/13585857/how-to-launch-ec2-instance-with-boto-specifying-size-of-ebs

dev_sda1 = boto.ec2.blockdevicemapping.EBSBlockDeviceType()
dev_sda1.size = 50 # size in Gigabytes
bdm = boto.ec2.blockdevicemapping.BlockDeviceMapping()
bdm['/dev/sda1'] = dev_sda1 
After this you can give the block device map in your run_instances call:

reservation = ec2.run_instances( image_id=AMI_ID, 
                                 key_name=EC2_KEY_HANDLE, 
                                 instance_type=INSTANCE_TYPE,
                                 security_groups = [ SECGROUP_HANDLE, ],
                                 block_device_map = bdm)
